title: Flex queue is the most disgusting, unbalanced bullshit riot has ever released.
body:
http://prntscr.com/hbb1lx

http://prntscr.com/hbb24d

Like how can you even consider this competitive? There's a huge fucking gap between a Silver player and a Diamond player. How about you make it to where your Solo queue MMR is matched with your Flex queue MMR so I can stop rolling the fucking dice?
